department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Maintenance, repairs and/or installation of plumbing systems
description: THESE SERVICES WILL BE DELIVERED UNDER A REGIONAL INDIVIDUAL STANDING OFFER (RI SO) TO PROVIDE ALL LABOUR, MATERIAL, TOOLS, EQUIPMENT, TRANSPORTATION AND SUPERVISION REQUIRED TO CONDUCT MAINTENANCE, REPAIRS AND/OR INSTALLATION OF PLUMBING SYSTEMS AT VARIOUS LOCATIONS OF CFB HALIFAX.
tags: location of delivery is a Province of Canada
Expected Contract Start Date and Expected Contract End Date are null

The contract is to be awarded to the vendor who submits the lowest price. Interested vendors are invited to submit their proposal electronically via the provided website.
